backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing submitted contact messages in a map, providing methods to submit messages and query all messages or their count.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI/UX enhancements, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short human-written descriptions of their purpose and styling updates.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_FAILURE_REPORT.md: Template for recording deployment failures, including timestamps, failing step, and full error output.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_OUTPUT.md: Document for capturing latest deployment status, timestamp, commit hash, and executed commands.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Runbook describing how to retry deployment without modifying code, including prerequisites and steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS layer defining professional theme variables, typography rules, accessibility focus states, and reusable component styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, favicon links, and script loader for the React application.
frontend/public/googled81497cd2eafdaf4.h: Google site verification file for domain ownership validation.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots configuration allowing all crawlers and pointing to the sitemap.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining app name, icons, colors, and standalone display mode.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap declaring the root URL with monthly change frequency.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring header, footer, all site sections, SEO data injection, and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary component that displays a fallback UI and reload option if runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, mutation submission, error handling, and a success state UI.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Renders a mobile navigation menu with active-state styling and click-to-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeader.ts: Displays a section title and optional subtitle with configurable alignment.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with text content, feature cards, and optional leadership profiles.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact information and renders the ContactForm alongside structured contact details.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Hero section with ocean background, tagline, title, subtitle, and buttons that smooth-scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Displays project cards using siteContent data with images, descriptions, and impact metrics.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders a grid of service cards with icons mapped from siteContent and a section header.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Shows testimonial cards with quotes, names, and roles sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Presents key value propositions in a grid with icons and text from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/SeoStructuredDat: Injects organization-level JSON-LD structured data for SEO using site content and brand assets.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Builds a footer with company info, quick links, contact details, and logo download support.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Creates a responsive site header with logo, desktop navigation, and toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Static content definitions for company info, hero text, services, projects, about, and testimonials.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to track and return the currently visible page section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, authentication handling, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutation hook for submitting messages through the backend actor and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRuntimeSeo.ts: Updates canonical and social meta tags at runtime based on the actual site URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports global styles by importing the root index.css file.
frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts: Exports constant paths for all brand logo and social image assets.
frontend/src/lib/isValidEmail.ts: Provides a simple email validation function using a basic regex.
frontend/src/lib/siteOrigin.ts: Utilities to get the current site origin and build full URLs safely.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, spacing, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending theme upgrade request.
